00002 #define MCMD_SYSTEM_SERIALIZE_H

00011 #include <mcMd/simulation/System.h>
00012 #include <mcMd/simulation/Simulation.h>
00013 #include <util/boundary/serialize.h>
00014 #include <mcMd/species/Species.h>
00015 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Molecule.h>
00016 #include <mcMd/chemistry/Atom.h>
00017 #include <util/space/Vector.h>
00018 #include <util/global.h>
00019 
00020 namespace McMd
00021 {
00022 
00023    using namespace Util;
00024 
00025    /* 
00026    * Serialize a System configuration to / from an archive.
00027    */
00028    template <class Archive>
00029    void System::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00030    {
00031       ar & boundary();
00032 
00033       Species* speciesPtr;
00034       int nSpecies = simulation().nSpecies();
00035 
00036       if (Archive::is_saving()) {
00037 
00038          System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00039          Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00040          int nMoleculeOut;
00041 
00042          for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00043             ar & iSpecies;
00044             nMoleculeOut = nMolecule(iSpecies);
00045             ar & nMoleculeOut;
00046             speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpecies);
00047             begin(iSpecies, molIter); 
00048             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00049                molIter->begin(atomIter); 
00050                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00051                   #ifdef MCMD_SHIFT
00052                   boundary().shift(atomIter->position(), atomIter->shift());
00053                   ar & atomIter->shift();
00054                   #else
00055                   boundary().shift(atomIter->position());
00056                   #endif
00057                   ar & atomIter->position();
00058                   ar & atomIter->velocity();
00059                }
00060             }
00061          }
00062 
00063       }
00064 
00065       if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00066 
00067          Molecule* molPtr;
00068          Molecule::AtomIterator atomIter;
00069          int iSpeciesIn, nMoleculeIn;
00070 
00071          for (int iSpecies = 0; iSpecies < nSpecies; ++iSpecies) {
00072             speciesPtr = &simulation().species(iSpecies);
00073             ar & iSpeciesIn;
00074             if (iSpeciesIn != iSpecies) {
00075                UTIL_THROW("Error: iSpeciesIn != iSpecies");
00076             }
00077             ar & nMoleculeIn;
00078             for (int iMol = 0; iMol < nMoleculeIn; ++iMol) {
00079                molPtr = &(speciesPtr->reservoir().pop());
00080                addMolecule(*molPtr);
00081                if (molPtr != &molecule(iSpecies, iMol)) {
00082                   UTIL_THROW("Molecule index error");
00083                }
00084                molPtr->begin(atomIter); 
00085                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00086                   ar & atomIter->position();
00087                   ar & atomIter->velocity();
00088                   #ifdef MCMD_SHIFT
00089                   ar & atomIter->shift();
00090                   boundary().shift(atomIter->position(), atom.shift());
00091                   #else
00092                   boundary().shift(atomIter->position());
00093                   #endif
00094                }
00095             }
00096          }
00097       }
00098 
00099    }
00100 
00101 } 
00102 #endif
